channel.title: "attacknpcswith" help
channel.description: Whenever I add it to a spell everything works fine but when i cast it it hits all npcs by me but it goes up next to the one i cast it on. also [code] [client-1-zammypker]: npcIndex: 336 magicID: 12891 Error at magic on npcs! [client-1-zammypker]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10000 [/code] whenever i use a spell that i added attacknpcswith

item.title: "attacknpcswith" help
item.dc:creator: @krawks12 krawks12
item.description:
@krawks12 wrote:

Whenever I add it to a spell everything works fine but when i cast it it hits all npcs by me but it goes up next to the one i cast it on. also

[client-1-zammypker]: npcIndex: 336 magicID: 12891
Error at magic on npcs!
[client-1-zammypker]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10000

whenever i use a spell that i added attacknpcswith
